titlestmt.titleproper: Inventory of the Bill Lawrence Papers 1996-2008
titlestmt.subtitle: Lawrence, Bill Papers Mss. Acc. 2006.29

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid created by Special Collections Staff, 2009

frontmatter.titlepage:
Inventory of the Bill Lawrence Papers, 1996-2008 A Collection in the
Special Collections Research Center Mss. Acc. 2006.29
Earl Gregg Swem Library, College of William and Mary 2009 &contact;
Processed by
Special Collection Staff.

archdesc.runner: Special Collections, Earl Gregg Swem Library, College of William and Mary

did.head: Overview of the Collection
did.abstract: This collection is composed entirely of scripts from Bill Lawrence. It includes approximately 90 scripts, including one from a 1996 episode of the television series "Spin City," and the rest from the television series "Scrubs" from the period 2001-2008. Many of the scripts are broadcast drafts, but the later ones become mostly shooting drafts. The scripts are ordered by the script number and not necessarily by date broadcast. Many of the scripts are signed by Bill Lawrence.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Collection is open to all researchers for use in the Special Collections Research Center in Swem Library only.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Before publishing quotations or excerpts from any materials, permission must be obtained from the Special Collections Research Center, and the holder of the copyright, if not Swem Library.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Bill Lawrence Papers, Special Collections Research Center, Swem Library, College of William and Mary.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The materials were acquired by Special Collections Research Center from Acc. 2006.29 gift of Bill Lawrence on 3/24/2006. on 03/24/2006.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Accession imported into Archon database from Manuscripts accessions database in 2007. Collection rehoused by Lauren Chapman in January 2009. Record revised in January 2009 by Amy Schindler.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Bill Lawrence (born December 6, 1968) is an American screenwriter, producer and director, best known as the creator of the television series "Scrubs." He graduated from the College of William and Mary in 1990. Lawrence wrote for hit shows including "Friends," "Boy Meets World," and "The Nanny" and produced the animated series "Clone High." He is also the creator of the sitcom "Spin City" and his current venture, the comedy-drama "Scrubs."
College of William and Mary class of 1990

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection is composed entirely of scripts from Bill Lawrence. It includes approximately 90 scripts, including one from a 1996 episode of the television series "Spin City," and the rest from the television series "Scrubs" from the period 2001-2008. Many of the scripts are broadcast drafts, but the later ones become mostly shooting drafts. The scripts are ordered by the script number and not necessarily by date broadcast. Many of the scripts are signed by Bill Lawrence.

controlaccess.head: Index Terms
controlaccess.p: This Collection is indexed under the following controlled access subject terms.

scopecontent.p: 7 May 1996. First shooting draft for the script for the Pilot episode of the television show Spin City. 55p. 1 item. Photocopy of Typescript.
